categories.IFC Portfolio / Pipeline Highlights: Any mention of IFC, World Bank, or direct connections to IFC mandate
categories.Macro Indicators: GDP, inflation, monetary policy, trade data for Singapore or major regional reports
categories.Policy & Political Economy: Regulatory changes, government policy, political developments affecting investment climate
categories.Financial Institutions & Capital Markets: Banks, funds, IPOs, debt issuance, fintech, venture capital
